summary: So I have a prompt for you if you're willing. Peter's been dating MJ for a while and keeping it a secret from Tony. When Tony...
question: So I have a prompt for you if you're willing. Peter's been dating MJ for a while and keeping it a secret from Tony. When Tony finds out he goes full on Overprotective father mode and stalks them on their date
answer:
This prompt is awesome!

- So when Tony finds out that Peter is dating MJ, he doesn’t mention it to Peter

- Instead, Tony decides to do a background check on MJ because “I need to keep my kid safe.”

- Tony gets FRIDAY to get everything possible about MJ

- Tony doesn’t find anything bad about MJ, but he’s still in that “Over-protective Parent” mode

- Tony decides that, if he really wants to know if this MJ girl is good for his kid, he’ll have to follow them around

- Tony asks FRIDAY where Peter and MJ are and FRIDAY replies, “They’re currently walking around central park, boss.”

- Tony thanks FRIDAY and heads to his car

- He picks the car that looks like any normal car because “I can’t let Peter see me. He’ll think that I’m taking helicopter parenting to a whole other level.”

- FRIDAY just says, “You’re always over-protective of Peter.”

- Tony just says, “I have good reasons why.”

- Once Tony gets to Central Park, he can already see Peter and MJ, but they’re facing away from him, so they can’t see him

- He proceeds to get out of his car and follow them around

- He’s close enough to intervene if needed, and far enough so he wouldn’t get caught

- Peter’s spider sense doesn’t alert him of Tony because it’s Tony, but MJ knows, she’s just not saying anything

- a few minutes later, Peter sneezes and Tony says, “Bless you.”

- Peter’s eyes widen, then he turns around quickly and sees Tony and yells, “What are you doing here, Mr. Stark?!?!”

- Tony smiles and says, “Just making sure my kid is safe!”

- MJ starts laughing and says, “Your dad is on a whole other level of over-protective.”

- Peter smiles at MJ and Tony and says, “He’s a good dad.”

I tried to make it so the ending was happy. I hope this was good enough.

Thanks for the ask!

You’re amazing! Don’t doubt that💙💚❤

Tags: @the-great-escapism @theofficaldeannawinchester @baloobird @gayboiloki @keep-a-bucket-full-of-stars @marvelbased @universemarvel @theincorrectavengers @tamaranianprincess @tonystarkdefensesquadmember @tonystarkdadmode @ihavealcoholinmyveins

tags: With the Devil at Your Side
summary: you know what would be great to read??? tony’s and readers relationship back when tony was a kid, the reader helping him get...
question: you know what would be great to read??? tony’s and readers relationship back when tony was a kid, the reader helping him get back up when his parents died... i just imagine a beautiful friendship between them in wtdays
answer:
TOTALLY - here’s a taste then

“You’re drinking yourself to death, Anthony,” you murmur.

“You’re one to talk,” he hisses. 

He rests his face against the pock-marked table in this pock-marked bar. He wants to sleep - bury himself away for hours until the sun falls from the sky and the world never wakes up.

You curl warm, smooth fingers around the back of his neck, squeeze. He knows if you squeezed harder, you could snap the top of his spine like a matchstick.

“What are you doing here,” he grunts - the liquor is rolling around in his stomach and making him ill.

You laugh softly - melodic laugh that floats into his ear like a gust of wind.

“Because you need me.”

He looks up at you and suddenly finds that he hates you. You’re too perfect looking in his hideaway - skin like stone and shimmering eyes and silky hair. This was his moment to be alone - this was his place of trash and degradation and drinking and a little cocaine.

And what’s really irritating is that you know all about doing those kinds of things when you’re sad. 

“Just let me drink in peace,” he sighs.

“I’m letting you,” you say coolly - calmly.

“You’re being a real hypocrite, you know,” he grits out. “I mean you used to drown yourself in all sorts of things and your boyfriends were dead - what? Like 45 years.”

You don’t grimace - don’t look angry at all. You tilt you head and smile at him like you know all the answers to the whole god damn universe.

“I’m not judging you, Tony,” you assure him, those hands returning to pet his hair. He likes it - feels himself rubbing against your palm out of instinct. 

“Good,” he replies curtly before downing another shot of whiskey. The taste burns all the way down - delicious fire.

Then he thinks of his parent’s lonely house and how he will have to go back there when the bar finally closes - how he will have to drive down the same road they died on. How he has to pack it all up - how he has to sleep in his childhood bed.

He looks at you - feels his heart tighten. “Will you - will you stay with me tonight? I don’t want to be…there alone.”

You grip his hand in yours - flash of white teeth and the kindest smile he’s ever seen. You’re so rarely gentle that it startles him.

“Of course, Tony,” you say. “I’m here for you always.”

TOTALLY - here’s a taste then

“You’re one to talk,” he hisses. 

He rests his face against the pock-marked table in this pock-marked bar. He wants to sleep - bury himself away for hours until the sun falls from the sky and the world never wakes up.

You curl warm, smooth fingers around the back of his neck, squeeze. He knows if you squeezed harder, you could snap the top of his spine like a matchstick.

summary:
Thor: [crying and pounding the counter in frustration] Where’s my cape?!
Tony: We don’t have time for this, Point Break.
Steve:...
body:
Thor: [crying and pounding the counter in frustration] Where’s my cape?!

Tony: We don’t have time for this, Point Break.

Steve: [worried] The town is in trouble.

Thor: [losing it completely] NOOO!! I NEED MY CAPE!!

blog.name: waspwidow
blog.title: with great power comes no future
blog.description: i used to have nothing. and then i got this job...this family. and it made me better. and now they're gone, and i'm still trying to be better. - eliza, she/they, icon by bigstarkenergy.

summary: I just thought of a prompt. warwinteriron with "James?" "Which one?"
question: I just thought of a prompt. warwinteriron with "James?" "Which one?"
answer:
tony loves his boyfriends, he really does.

but sometimes, dating two men who are both named ‘james’ can be confusing as all hell - especially when they seem to find it hilarious.

he’s in the kitchen, straining to reach a shelf that’s just an inch too high aboce his head. “james? mind giving me a hand?”

there’s a momentary hush, and then rhodey snickers, before bucky calls out, “which one?”

god, he doesn’t know how he’s going to handle that for the rest of his life.

summary: I killed a rich woman for her ticket on a super luxurious cruise and stole her luggage as well so I could fit in. Once on the...
body: I killed a rich woman for her ticket on a super luxurious cruise and stole her luggage as well so I could fit in. Once on the cruise, I sidled up to Tony Stark, told him I was a huge fan and asked if he would help me with my personal statements for my grad apps. He said yes and then called the rest of the team over and that’s how The Avengers helped me get into a master’s program.

blog.description: This is all just random thoughts and basically a mind dump but Marvel stuff. Have a good day guys,gals, and non-binary pals.

summary:
Tony on the phone: so if a kid is throwing up with a 102° fever, you go to urgent care right?
Clint: no, only go to urgent care...
body:
Tony on the phone: so if a kid is throwing up with a 102° fever, you go to urgent care right?

Clint: no, only go to urgent care if it’s +104°

Tony: okay, thank you

Clint:no problem bye

Clint,picking his phone back up: what hold up you have a kid wh-

blog.name: carlcatron
blog.title: Sax Dragon
blog.description: I just love making music with my friends.

summary: One more sample of my orchestra playing the score from the 2nd Avengers: Endgame trailer(Whatever It Takes). If you like it,...
caption:
One more sample of my orchestra playing the score from the 2nd Avengers: Endgame trailer(Whatever It Takes). If you like it, please subscribe. The full music video comes out MONDAY! I’m still editing and mixing & mastering, so even at this point, things are still getting better. I hope you like what you see and hear and I hope to see you guys Monday for the finished product. It’s been about 80 personal hours of work, and several weeks of coordinating with musicians all over the world. Can’t wait for you to see! #AvengersAssemble

www.youtube.com/carlcatron

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: Just before the endgame
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IJAY6i

by lomku

A re-writing of the final battle between Tony Stark and Thanos, and their thoughts during the fight.

Words: 2692, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Thanos, Stephen Strange, Peter Quill
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Hurt Tony, POV Tony Stark, POV Thanos, this is a retelling of the final fight on Titan, Avengers: Infinity War Part 1 (Movie)


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2IJAY6i

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

blog.name: fictional-downey
blog.title: Fictional Downey
blog.description: Hi! Welcome to my Robert Downey Jr. fanfiction blog! I'm a HUGE fan of RDJ (and not just since he took on the role of Iron Man I've loved him for YEARS). Yes, I know there is TONS of fanfiction out there and mine isn't anything special, but I'm posting anyway ;-). I'll post chapter by chapter, BUT also have all the finished chapters posted under the "The Stories" link below. Feedback is appreciated - even POLITE criticism. Have fun (and yes, there are ADULT chapters)!

tags: I collect all unmasked Tony things
